citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 930 on
26-JAN-17.
Inspector knocked on door of house with no answer, waited 30 minutes, knocked again on door of house with no
answer.
